info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Schenectady County through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delanson, or 11 miles south of Amsterdam. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Pea size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Duanesburg, Delanson, Esperance, Duane, Mariaville Lake, Mariaville, Duane Mansion, Eaton Corners, Braman Corners, Esperance Station, Quaker Street and Duane Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
